message: Thank you for the recommendation. Since you did not recommend buying, I'm going to pass on this one. I'm interested in learning more about your products and how you determine quality, so I'll be watching closely.

This leads me to believe either your recommendations are unreliable, or there's something else going on. Can you shed some light on your decision-making process?
